issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

If the content is based on something that the user had done, it would be a good extension of the current API to allow the app to pre-populate the user message field in the feed dialog. (See here: http://support.appcelerator.net/discussions/titanium-mobile-discuss...)

{html}
fields.summary: Facebook API: Allow app to pre-set the content of the user_message for setting status / streamPublish / etc.

comments.body:
{html}

Ticket lost to the ravages of time. Irrelevant with the new API, as well (and there's even a KS test for it).

{html}
